modName: Aurlyn and Serenity - Standalone Replacers -  HD Head Meshes - DELETED
summary: HD Head Meshes for Aurlyn and Serenity
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][b][color=#76a5af][size=4][img]https://i.imgur.com/kbZRLMK.png[/img]

+DESCRIPTION[b]+[/b][/size][/color][/b]
[/font][font=Georgia][size=1][color=#d9ead3]
This mod changes the appearance of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83416/?]Aurlyn Dawnstone[/url] and her daughter Serenity. 
The new heads have been created using HD High Poly Meshes(CITRUS). 
It's standalone, you don't need any other mod to make it work, other than Aurlyn.esp, of course.
Body meshes are [color=#6aa84f][b]SFW [/b][/color], if you want a nude body , you can easily change the meshes yourself as explained below.

CBBE and UNP options available .
[/color][/size][/font]

[color=#f9cb9c][size=3]About SSE Version: [/size][/color][b][b][color=#fff2cc][size=3]
[/size][/color][b][color=#efefef]I am happy with Classic Skyrim and do not intend to port any of my mods for the time being. 

[size=5]- MOD IS COMPLETE, DO NOT EXPECT ANY UPDATE -[/size][/color][/b]
[/b]


[/b][size=5]*[/size]


[font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][size=4][b]+INSTALL[/b][b]+[/b][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3][size=1]Choose only one main file: CBBE , UNP .[/size][/color]
[color=#d9ead3]Download with your favourite mod manager and activate.
I recommend using Mod Organizer for keeping the Data folder clean . 
I don't recommend manual installation, but if you wish, download and copy/paste the entire mod into your data folder.
Always load AurlynOverhaul.esp AFTER the main mod . Use LOOT to sort your load order. [/color][/font][color=#d9ead3]
[/color][b][color=#76a5af]

[b][color=#76a5af][font=Tahoma][color=#e06666][size=2]My other Mods:
[/size][/color][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82696?]Vilja in Skyrim - Face Overhaul[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84127/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84443?]Virelda - Replacer[/url][/color][/b]
[/color]
[size=5]*[/size]

[font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][size=3]+INSTALL YOUR OWN BODY PRESET[/size][/color][/font][/b][font=Tahoma][color=#76a5af][b][size=3]+[/size]
[/b][/color]
[/font][size=1][font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3]If you use a custom bodyslide preset and want to make Vilja use it as well, here's how to do it:

- If your preset is based on th CBBE (or UNP) body, install the CBBE (or UNP) body main file first 

[/color][/font][/size][color=#d9ead3]- Copy the body meshes which you want to use from the folder meshes\actors\character\character assets (or you can generate a custom one with bodyslide)[/color][size=1][font=Georgia][color=#d9ead3]
[/color]
femalebody_0
femalebody_1
femalehands_0
femalehands_1
femalefeet_0
femalefeet_1[color=#d9ead3]
[/color][/font][/size][font=Georgia]
[/font]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/9wS4dfn.png[/img]
